info.title: Sugra Systems API for Finance Full Schema
info.description: Sugra Systems, Inc. AI Powere FinTech behinde the Sugra AI solution

get.summary: Retrieves all available information for a given stock symbol.
get.description: Retrieve detailed information for a specific stock symbol.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The stock symbol to retrieve information for.

200.description: All available information for the specified stock symbol.

get.summary: Get Stock Price
get.description: Retrieves detailed price information including current price, open, previous close, day high, day low, volume, market cap, and average prices for a given stock symbol.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The stock symbol for which to retrieve detailed price information.

200.description: Successful response with detailed stock price information.

currentPrice.description: The current price of the stock.

open.description: The opening price of the stock for the trading day.

previousClose.description: The closing price of the stock from the previous trading day.

dayHigh.description: The highest price of the stock for the current trading day.

dayLow.description: The lowest price of the stock for the current trading day.

volume.description: The trading volume of the stock.

marketCap.description: The market capitalization of the stock.

fiftyDayAverage.description: The 50-day moving average price of the stock.

fiftyTwoWeekHigh.description: The highest price of the stock in the last 52 weeks.

fiftyTwoWeekLow.description: The lowest price of the stock in the last 52 weeks.

twoHundredDayAverage.description: The 200-day moving average price of the stock.

get.summary: Get Stock Dividend Information
get.description: Retrieves dividend information for a given stock symbol, including dividend yield, rate, ex-dividend date, and last dividend details.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The stock symbol for which to retrieve dividend information.

200.description: Successful response with the stock's dividend information.

dividendYield.description: The dividend yield of the stock.

dividendRate.description: The annual dividend rate of the stock.

exDividendDate.description: The ex-dividend date represented as a Unix timestamp.

lastDividendDate.description: The date of the last dividend payment represented as a Unix timestamp.

lastDividendValue.description: The value of the last dividend payment.

get.summary: Retrieves news related to a given stock symbol.
get.description: Retrieve the latest news articles for a specific stock symbol.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The stock symbol for which to retrieve news.

200.description: Latest news articles for the specified stock symbol.

get.summary: Retrieves stock recommendations for a given symbol.
get.description: Retrieve analyst recommendations for a specific stock symbol.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The stock symbol for which to retrieve recommendations.

200.description: Analyst recommendations for the specified stock symbol.

get.summary: Retrieves upgrades and downgrades for a given stock symbol.
get.description: Retrieve historical upgrade and downgrade actions for a specific stock symbol.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The stock symbol for which to retrieve upgrade and downgrade actions.

200.description: Historical upgrade and downgrade actions for the specified stock symbol.

get.summary: Retrieve targets for a stock symbol

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The stock symbol to retrieve targets for

200.description: Successful response with price targets

400.description: Bad request or error in fetching price targets

404.description: No price target updates available or stock symbol not found

get.summary: Retrieves historical actions related to a given stock symbol.
get.description: Retrieve a list of historical actions such as dividends, stock splits, and other corporate actions for a specific stock symbol.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The stock symbol for which to retrieve historical actions.

200.description: Historical corporate actions for the specified stock symbol.

get.summary: Retrieves earnings report dates for a given stock symbol.
get.description: Retrieve a list of scheduled and historical earnings report dates for a specific stock symbol.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The stock symbol for which to retrieve earnings report dates.

200.description: Earnings report dates for the specified stock symbol.

get.summary: Retrieves top institutional holders for a given stock symbol.
get.description: Retrieve a list of top institutional holders, including their holdings and related information, for a specific stock symbol.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The stock symbol for which to retrieve top institutional holders.

200.description: Top institutional holders for the specified stock symbol.

get.summary: Retrieves top mutual fund holders for a given stock symbol.
get.description: Retrieve a list of top mutual fund holders, including their holdings and related information, for a specific stock symbol.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The stock symbol for which to retrieve top mutual fund holders.

200.description: Top mutual fund holders for the specified stock symbol.

get.summary: Retrieves insider roster holders for a given stock symbol.
get.description: Retrieve a list of insider roster holders, including their holdings and related information, for a specific stock symbol.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The stock symbol for which to retrieve insider roster holders.

200.description: Insider roster holders for the specified stock symbol.

get.summary: Retrieves insider transactions for a given stock symbol.
get.description: Retrieve a list of recent insider transactions, including details about the transaction, for a specific stock symbol.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The stock symbol for which to retrieve insider transactions.

200.description: Recent insider transactions for the specified stock symbol.

get.summary: Retrieves annual or quarterly income statements for a given stock symbol.
get.description: Retrieve detailed annual or quarterly financial income statements for a specific stock symbol. The {periodicity} path parameter should be either 'annual' or 'quarterly'.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The stock symbol for which to retrieve annual or quarterly income statements.

parameters.name: periodicity
parameters.description: Specifies the periodicity of the income statement data. Can be either 'annual' or 'quarterly'.

200.description: Annual or Quarterly income statements for the specified stock symbol.

get.summary: Retrieves annual or quarterly balance sheets for a given stock symbol.
get.description: Retrieve detailed annual or quarterly financial balance sheet data for a specific stock symbol. The {periodicity} path parameter should be either 'annual' or 'quarterly'.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The stock symbol for which to retrieve annual or quarterly balance sheet data.

parameters.name: periodicity
parameters.description: Specifies the periodicity of the balance sheet data. Can be either 'annual' or 'quarterly'.

200.description: Annual or Quarterly balance sheet data for the specified stock symbol.

get.summary: Retrieves annual or quarterly cash flow data for a given stock symbol.
get.description: Retrieve detailed annual or quarterly cash flow statements for a specific stock symbol. The {periodicity} path parameter should be either 'annual' or 'quarterly'.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The stock symbol for which to retrieve annual or quarterly cash flow data.

parameters.name: periodicity
parameters.description: Specifies the periodicity of the cash flow data. Can be either 'annual' or 'quarterly'.

200.description: Annual or Quarterly cash flow data for the specified stock symbol.

get.summary: Retrieves multiple stock quotes
get.description: Fetches stock quotes for given symbols with specified fields.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of stock symbols (e.g., AAPL,MSFT).

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response (e.g., shortName,open,marketCap).

200.description: A list of stock quotes with specified fields.

get.summary: Get technical analysis for a stock symbol

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Stock symbol to retrieve technical analysis for

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: Interval for technical analysis

200.description: Successful response

get.summary: Retrieve SEC filings for a specific stock symbol

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The stock symbol for which to retrieve SEC filings.

200.description: A list of SEC filings for the given stock symbol.

404.description: Ticker symbol not found or CIK mapping unavailable.

500.description: Failed to fetch filings or no filings available.

get.summary: Retrieves the ISIN (International Securities Identification Number) for a given stock symbol.
get.description: Retrieve the ISIN associated with a specific stock symbol.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The stock symbol for which to retrieve the ISIN.

200.description: ISIN associated with the specified stock symbol.
